resources.string: My app introduces the use and features of smartphones in modern life and how to create working Android applications. I designed each of the App screen layout using XML and the App dynamic using Java. It also shows my life experiences as a cool smooth pigeon, like where I hang, fly around, the music I groove to, the animals I don\'t wish to be because they\'re ENDANGERED and the autos I be poopin on on a daily basis!
This app shows all of my tallest building conquests. Burj Khalifa, Freedom Tower, Tapei 101, you know how I do. When I\'m feeling low-key I fly to NYC and lounge on the Brooklyn Bridge. Squawk!
This app shows my top tunes. Hawaiian Kickboxer for when I\'m fluffin on the beaches of Honolulu and Drumadics when I\'m in NYC subways hustlin and bustlin.

This app shows some animals that wish they were 100% pigeon because they are ENDANGERED and nearly out of existence while we pigeons are thriving. If I\'m not too busy flossin with my pigeon army, I might fly around these animals and taunt them about being endangered.
This app shows the type of cars I be poopin on on daily basis! Also the amount of moola I be making from letting these foolish human beings park on our streets.
